text: Sir Lloyd Erskine Sandiford, KA, PC (24 March 1937 â€“ 26 June 2023) was a Barbadian politician. He was the fourth Prime Minister of Barbados from 1987 to 1994. Sandiford died on 26 June 2023 at a hospital in Bridgetown, Barbados at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Barbados
title: Lloyd Erskine Sandiford
